main event: A pilot observed a brilliant spherical object moving at high speed near Williams AFB, Arizona, on March 24, 1953.
interesting points: The object appeared stationary at first and then moved off quickly,It was estimated to be about half the size of the moon,The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 minutes,The pilot speculated it could have been a radar foil weather balloon,The object was traveling from West to East at an altitude of 5,500 feet.
